thread.title: Jimbo
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Jimbo

author: Jimbo
title: Jimbo
text: I love it. I bought this because of the price and reviews. I initially bought a Davinci IQ for $274 and it quit working after 2 months. This CFC is perfect. You put in your dry herb and set the desired temp (I like 405) turn it on and vape for 5 minutes and it shuts off. Perfect amount of time for a session. I highly recommend. I use my daily. Light weight and comfortable.
